## Vector2 class

Class representing a vector containing 2 coordinates

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class Vector2 
```

|  --- | --- | --- |

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [x](./decentraland-ecs.vector2.x.md) |  | <code>number</code> | defines the first coordinate |
|  [y](./decentraland-ecs.vector2.y.md) |  | <code>number</code> | defines the second coordinate |

If a coordinate of "value" is lower than "min" coordinates, the returned Vector2 is given this "min" coordinate. If a coordinate of "value" is greater than "max" coordinates, the returned Vector2 is given this "max" coordinate |
